verses.roman:
svarūpādi-saha gosāñi āchena vasiyā
hena-kāle raghunātha milila āsiyā

synonyms: svarūpa-ādi-saha—in the company of devotees, headed by Svarūpa Dāmodara; gosāñi—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āchena vasiyā—was sitting; hena-kāle—at this time; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; milila—met; āsiyā—coming.
translation: When Raghunātha dāsa met Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the Lord was sitting with His companions, headed by Svarūpa Dāmodara.
